catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 246
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: cheerful, bright garden-like scenes featuring children playing, dancing, pulling a boat on wheels full of toys; playing games with balls, battledore, tops, etc.; a few adults selling toys and games, and acting as guardians; wisteria trellis at end
signed: LLC at end of scroll: [Painted by Mitsukuni]
title: Scenes from the Four Seasons
